name: Raigam Devilled Chicken Flavor Soya Meat
description: Raigam Chicken Soya Devel is a delicious “Devel Soya Meat” product with “Natural Chicken Flavour”. Add garlic, ginger, onion and green chilli to enhance the taste with the chicken flavoured sachet as well as the sauce sachet. Raigam Devel Chicken Soya is ideal as a bite or with meals. No genetically modified food ingredients included.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
